pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)

Obtained by using the $(l:gotchard/items/ride_chemy_cards#ufo_x_ride_chemy_card)UFO-X Ride Chemy Card$(/l) in a $(l:gotchard/arsenal/chemy_riser)Chemy Riser$(/l) or $(l:gotchard/arsenal/chemy_riser_supana)Chemy Riser (Supana Kurogane Ver.)$(/l)
